"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12","content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.container2","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container2 img3","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1 text-center d-block","style":{"color":"white"},"caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Terms And Conditions"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Terms of Use :"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h3"}},{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"This app's mission is to improve lives through learning. We enable anyone anywhere to create and share educational courses (instructors) and to enroll in these educational courses to learn (students). We consider our marketplace model the best way to offer valuable educational content to our users. We need rules to keep our platform and services safe for you, us and our student and instructor community. These Terms apply to all your activities on this website, this platform, you must also agree to the Instructor Terms. We also provide details regarding our processing of personal data of our students and instructors in our Privacy Policy. If you are using application as part of your employer’s For Business learning and development program, you can consult our app for Business Privacy Statement."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Accounts :"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h3"}},{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"
You need an account for most activities on our platform, including to purchase and enroll in a course or to submit a course for publication. When setting up and maintaining your account, you must provide and continue to provide accurate and complete information, including a valid email address. You have complete responsibility for your account and everything that happens on your account, including for any harm or damage (to us or anyone else) caused by someone using your account without your permission. This means you need to be careful with your password. You may not transfer your account to someone else or use someone else’s account. If you contact us to request access to an account, we will not grant you such access unless you can provide us with the information that we need to prove you are the owner of that account. In the event of the death of a user, the account of that user will be closed.

You may not share your account login credentials with anyone else. You are responsible for what happens with your account and we will not intervene in disputes between students or instructors who have shared account login credentials. You must notify us immediately upon learning that someone else may be using your account without your permission (or if you suspect any other breach of security) by contacting our Support Team. We may request some information from you to confirm that you are indeed the owner of your account.

Students and instructors must be at least 18 years of age to create an account on Learn It and use the Services. If you are younger than 18 but above the required age for consent to use online services where you live, you may not set up an account, but we encourage you to invite a parent or guardian to open an account and help you enroll in courses that are appropriate for you. If you are below this age of consent to use online services, you may not create a this app account. If we discover that you have created an account that violates these rules, we will terminate your account. Under our Instructor Terms, you may be requested to verify your identity before you are authorized to submit a course for publication on this application.

You can terminate your account at any time by following the steps here. Check our Privacy Policy to see what happens when you terminate your account.

"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.container22","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container22 img4 background-secondary","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid3","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid3 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","style":{"background":"rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.1)"},"content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid3$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.layoutGrid3$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.container19","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container19 img4 background-secondary","renderMode":"footer","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"1.MyFirstModule.Term_Condition.text10","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text10","style":{"background":"rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.1)"},"caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Online Reading App

E-State,Hub

1800-111-334-070

General Queries:
online@reading.com / app@reading.com


Feel free to send us your queries regarding products,service or to become our channel partner.Complains are welcome as well, we take them as a note for improvement and we endeavour to answer all enquires shortly on business days."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
